text: Sybi Hida is a member of the Assembly of the Republic of Albania for the Democratic Party of Albania. He has been working for Ministry of Finance for a long period, and he is one of the top experts in macroeconomic and fiscal policies in Albania. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Democratic Party of Albania politicians Category:Members of the Parliament of Albania Category:21st-century Albanian politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sybi Hida
